titleStmt.title: SII 12.193: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 193. (A.R. No. 439 of 1921). TIRUVEṆṆAINALLŪR, TIRUKKOYILUR TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE MAṆḌAPA IN FRONT OF THE NAṬANA-SABHĀ IN THE KṚIPĀPURĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This is also dated in the 16th year and records a gift of 32 cows for burning a perpetual lamp in the temple of [Āṭkoṇ]ḍadēva at Tiruveṇṇainallūr by Kaviṉi Sambandapperumāḷ alias Vālēnduma[vu]li-Bhaṭṭar, a member of the village assembly. Reference is also made to a gift of lamp endowed by the same person sometime previously in the reign of Rājarāja III.See No. 177 above.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
The inscription is built in at the left end.vattikaḷ śrī Avaṉiāḷappiṟanta kopperuñciṅkatevarkku yāṇṭu 10 6 tiruveṇṇai
ṭa tevarkku Ivvūr capaiyāril kaviṉi campantapperumāḷāṉa vālentu mavulipaṭṭar muṉṉāḷ Irā
yaṟṟu Aparapaṣattu tri tiyaiyum veḷḷikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Uttirattu nāḷ Iṉṉāyaṉār koyil tiruan
viḷakkil muṉ(m)pu Eriyum tirununtāviḷakkukku mele Oru tirunun tāviḷakku Eṟṟi Iṭakkaṭavatāka Iṉṉāḷ
ntāviḷakku Oṉṟum Erippatāka muppatuvaṭṭattu civappirāmaṇar kaik koṇṭa pacu 3 10 2- Ippacu
ṭom muppatuvaṭṭattu civappirāmaṇarom . Itu paṉmāheśvara rakṣai
Digital edition of SII 12.193 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
